thread.title: Soap time bombs: 15 big secrets still to explode in EastEnders, Emmerdale, Coronation Street, Hollyoaks and Neighbours

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Soap time bombs: 15 big secrets still to explode in EastEnders, Emmerdale, Coronation Street, Hollyoaks and Neighbours

organizations.name: facebook follow us on twitter soaps newsletter follow @mirrortv subscribe

text:
Soap time bombs: 15 big secrets still to explode in EastEnders, Emmerdale, Coronation Street, Hollyoaks and Neighbours Sexual predators, baby daddies and secret affairs all to be revealed Share Comments By Kyle O'Sullivan 17:41, 28 FEB 2017 TV Share Comments Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email Soap fans have a lot to look forward to this spring with tonnes of major storylines set to explode in dramatic fashion.
Killers and sexual predators may be about to get their comeuppance, secret baby daddies could be revealed, and several characters are even set to return from the dead.
Soap bosses are keeping the plots tightly under wraps as our favourite shows move towards a series of action-packed climaxes.
Here are the soap time bombs that we are eagerly anticipating:
1) Nathan is sexually exploiting Bethany (Coronation Street)
Nasty Nathan has vile plans for schoolgirl Bethany (Photo: ITV)
Corrie viewers have been left feeling increasingly uncomfortable as young Bethany gets more involved with her older boyfriend Nathan.
The schoolgirl lost her virginity to the sinister salon owner, who now plans to pimp her out to one of his mates.
This week Lucy Fallon called the sex grooming storyline “disturbing” and admitted that upcoming scenes made her skin crawl.
Will mum Sarah rumble the dangerous predator when she meets him this week? Can Bethany escape Nathan’s clutches before she’s subjected to even more abuse?
2) Pierce is an evil rapist (Emmerdale)
Will Rhona stand up to Piers? The resident village villain has been terrorising his partner Rhona for months.
Fans watched in dismay as Rhona accepted creepy Pierce’s second proposal, despite him forcing himself on her at the start of the year.
Dales showrunner Iain MacLeod has revealed that fans should watch out for some “heart-stoppingly dramatic” episodes for the couple this spring.
Could Pierce inflict his most vicious assault yet, or will a petrified Rhona finally pluck up the courage to fight back, and could fans get their wish for the evil rapist to be killed off ?
Read More EastEnders' Muslim viewers slam the depiction of their religion on the soap: 'They're always boozing' 3) Phil is the daddy of Denise’s son (EastEnders)
Is this the last time Phil will hold his son? (Photo: BBC) Sharon, Shirley, Patrick and Phil himself have already discovered the shocking truth, but will Kim be so keen to take on her sister’s son knowing he has Mitchell blood?
The little bundle of joy would do well to avoid Walford all together, with adoptive parents seeming the far better option.
Will getting the secret identity out in the open persuade Denise to reconsider the adoption? And does the Square really need another Mitchell spawn?
4) David and Leo’s hunt for their real dad (Neighbours)
Will the twins ever find their real dad? (Photo: Channel 5) David and Leo Tanaka are no closer to discovering who their father is after blood tests proved homeless Bradley Satchwell was not the man they seek.
With the twins back to where they started, minus the cash bribe Bradley did a runner with, it waits to be seen what they’ll decide to do next.
Is the identity of the twins dad someone we already know, and could paternity problems lead to a romance between Leo and a comforting Amy?
5) Louis is the father of Leela’s baby (Hollyoaks)
Leela and Louis (Photo: Lime Pictures)
No one has discovered that baby Daniel is the result of a one-night stand between Louis and Leela. The pair have done well to keep it hidden for so long but secrets never last in Hollyoaks, and people are sure to start asking more questions.
Louis and Simon were separated at the time of conception but it is doubtful that she will accept that as an excuse and the big reveal is likely to tear the Loveday family apart.
Will Louis do the honourable thing and confess to being the baby’s dad, or will Simone’s world come crushing down when she discovers the truth herself? And could killer Cameron find out and seek revenge from behind bars?
6) Aidan can't decide between Eva and Maria (Coronation Street)
Aidan just can't decide who he wants to be with Aidan has not only been unfaithful to Eva behind her back but has also promised Maria that his future is with her.
To make matters worse Eva has agreed to let young Liam live with her and Aidan while Maria spends time behind bars.
If Eva’s reaction to thinking Aidan was having an affair with Alya is anything to go by, then expect fireworks when the love rat finally has to face up to his cheating ways.
How will Eva react when the truth comes out about her two-timing boyfriend? Could Maria get an early prison release and force Aidan to choose between the ladies?
7) Whitney and Mick’s secret snog (EastEnders)
Mick could replace Lee as the Carter man in Whitney's life (Photo: BBC)
Mick has taken advantage of wife Linda living in Watford by getting up close and personal to his son’s wife Whitney.
Fans are convinced that with Lee now out of the picture and with Whitney moving into the Queen Vic, a full-on affair is just around the corner .
Writers on the show may have been forced into either scrapping or revving up this storyline after Danny Dyer’s shock break from filming.
Could romance blossom between the pair now they’re under the same roof, and will Denise blow it all by telling someone about the hospital kiss she witnessed?
Read More Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield offered roles in Hollyoaks 8) Joel and Bart killed Katy Fox (Hollyoaks)
Joel and Bart are about to be discovered (Photo: Lime Pictures) Goldie’s ex Shane is in possession of a video that shows Joel and Bart providing Katy with the heroin that killed her.
Suspicious dad Warren is closing the net and is about to put the pieces together to discover that his own son and Bart were to blame.
With the pressure mounting the pair could be quick to turn on each other to avoid getting the blame themselves.
Will either of Joel or Bart take the blame to save the other one, and how will Warren react when he finds out who was responsible for his sister’s death?
9) Michelle and Preston’s extra curricular activities (EastEnders)
Will Michelle and Preston put the age gap aside? (Photo: BBC)
EastEnders fans have been less than impressed with Michelle since she returned from Florida.
It was quickly discovered that the teacher had been sleeping with her student, 17-year-old Preston, and had been exiled by husband Tim and son Mark.
Michelle looked set to ditch her schoolboy lover after catching him in bed with niece Bex, but moments later she was going up the stairs with him.
How will her family react when they discover the shocking truth behind her return, and who will protect her from Sharon when she finds out Preston has been living in her house?
10) Phelan is a scheming murderer (Coronation Street)
Could Andy return to see off Phelan? (Photo: ITV) Conman Phelan scammed the Street out of thousands and left former love rival Michael for dead, all while keeping up a romance with Eileen.
Viewers were reeling in shock when the evil builder brutally battered Andy with a laptop after discovering evidence behind his dodgy schemes.
Pat is quickly becoming as notorious as Corrie legends Richard Hillman and John Stape, but we know that they eventually got their dues.
With Luke now digging around, will he become Phelan’s next victim, or will he expose him to his neighbours? Could Andy make a sensational return and get his final revenge?
11) Psycho Emma is on the brink of a meltdown (Emmerdale)
Emma really has lost the plot (Photo: ITV) Killer Emma has struggled to stay in control after she pushed husband James off a motorway bridge, causing a catastrophic car pile up below.
Emmerdale fans called for Emma to be axed after she framed Kasim for the arson attack on a taxi in a bid to save her son Finn from prison.
Will the guilt finally force the crazed murderer to confess to her crimes, or will her reckless acts of violence see her face time behind bars?
12) Darcy is very much still alive (Hollyoaks)
Adam is in for the shock of his life (Photo: Lime Pictures) In a shock twist Adam’s fiancé Darcy is set to rock up in the village and cause problems for the Donovans.
Everyone believes Darcy is dead after vanishing during a boat trip with Adam, but his brother Liam, Tracey and Grace are hiding a huge secret about her disappearance.
How will Adam react to his girlfriend coming back from the dead, and where has she been for all this time?
13) Shona has a mystery connection to Kylie (Coronation Street)
Shona sheds a tear at Kylie's grave (Photo: ITV) Coronation Street revealed there’s a strange link between Shona and the late Kylie when she visited the dead Platt’s grave .
The characters never met on screen but Shona is clearly connected in some way as she panicked when gobby Gemma insisted they’d met before.
She could be related to Kylie or her nasty ex Callum, who was murdered in the 2015 live episode.
Do those tears at Kylie’s graveside prove Shona is related to her? Could the connection be more serious and link the Platts back to Callum or murderer Clayton?
14) Fake Dee impersonating Toadie’s dead wife (Neighbours)
What other secrets is Fake Dee hiding? Scheming Fake Dee has been trying to seduce poor Toadie and steal him away from his beloved wife Sonya.
The flirty imposter, otherwise known as Andrea Sommers, has been pretending to be the lawyer’s dead wife for weeks and even tried to tempt him by meeting him in just a towel.
A stunned Toadie may not be able to resist her advances for long and could fall in love with her and into her money trap.
Will Fake Dee be rumbled by the Ramsay Street residents, or will Toadie ditch Sonia for his former wife?
15) Max Branning’s plan to destroy Walford (EastEnders)
When will Max implement his evil master plan? (Photo: BBC) Despite having seemingly forgiven the residents of the Square after his wrongful imprisonment for the murder of Lucy Beale, Max is set to cause carnage in the coming weeks.
He met a mysterious stranger at The Shard and seems hell-bent on making those who wronged him pay, and is starting by targeting the Queen Vic pub.
It is unclear had deep Max’s scheming will go, but some viewers have even attempted to blame him for the entire bus crash .
Will Max use the Carters’ financial issues to takeover the pub, could he have larger plans set in motion, and who is his shady associate?
